TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Costa_Riga, title = Costa_Riga, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Costa_Riga} }

S.FORM: u Costa Riga sa i labu nu Congnanmeico, itiza i 10 00 N, 84 00 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 51,100 km2.u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 51,060 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 40 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 4,872,543. kakalukan umah sa 37.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 51.50%, zumaay henay umah sa 11.40% tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u San Jose . sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 15 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Luis Guillermo Solís , micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 5 bulad 8 demiad. u hata nu Costa riga u kulit nu hata nu Costa riga sa, situlu a kulit, u sumilaway u salenagcay atu sumanahay. Costa Riga kapulungan a kanatal (nu kamu nu Si-Ban-Ya: República de Costa Rica), ngangan tu Costa riga , u imi malubicay a dadipasan ,nu inutebanan Amiliak a kanatal, nuwamisan belaw u Nicaragua nutimulan u Panama matatules ku lala', kahenulan a tuse u Sen-he-si , Costa riga u ayzaay i kitakit u saayaway mipaelesan a hitay nu kanatal, imahini nu Costa riga nu inutebanan Amiliak a kakitizaan cin-ci u sakapahay nipalahadan a kanatal, kapah makakat kuni kauzip na mahini sibalucu' mipuput tu ihekalay nu mauzipay mulangway i kanatal, yadah ku nu lalayan tu pidiputan, masilut tu i bu-pu-se masilut tu 2020 a mihcaan miales tu namalahitay mananeng tu singangan tu i kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Costa riga :República de Costa Rica), .) laylay iayaw a zitay nu Ke-lung-pu , izaw tu muengen ku In-di-an a tdemaw i tini i Costa riga u Cung-mey-cow-uan-min makakatay ku nika uzip atu An-ti-se-wen-min i kalikeluhan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) kasumamadan tu 16 a mihcaan, i tiniay a Ya-me a tademaw a tademaw atu A-ce-tay-ce a tademaw, mademec nu Spain a tademaw, satu Costa riga mala u Spain a lala' baluhay a Spain satimulan a kenis,i sebu i tiza i Ka-ta-ke (Cartago). (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 16世紀, (Cartago).) Costa riga makalaliw tu nipitebung ilawlaw nu Cung-may-cow paykanatal masumad tu kawaw nu hitay, caay kalecat tu nu belaw nu kanatal, Costa riga u tanektekay masungaay atu binawlan kumikuwanay tu mahiniay, kasumamdan tu 19 a mihcaan tu zikuzan, kinatusa pacena tu uni u kalalepu a kawaw masawacu tu kunipalahat nu binawlan, 1948 a mihcaan kangangayaw nu kanatal Costa riga a Cung-tung ci He-say-bey-ke-lay-si-bey-lay-rl musakamu paliwasak tu hitay, atu i 1949 a mihcaan unian pahulic han, namahini hausa Costa riga mikaput tu nayay a hitay mikaput tunu binawlanay a nizatengan.Costa riga anumahinihini mahiza tu palekal tu kanatalay , nika malecat tu katalakaw kuni kauzip, izaw amin ku tantuwa' nu lala', saaca papiidangay a kawaw macakat kuni palahat. .) helal nu lala' Costa riga i tini inutebanan Amilika tanayu'ay likecu'ay a kakitizaan, amis balattu cacay bataan a tu(北緯10度), tipan balattu walu bataan izaw ku sepat a tu(西經84度), nutimulan micapi tu Ciy-le-pi' a bayu , satipan micapi nuwamisan a waliyu , izaw ku 1,290 malebut miy ku dadipasan (nuwalian a tukus Ciy-le-pi-hay 212 malebut nu miy, satipan a tukus u waliyu 1016 malaebut a depah.Costa riga nuwamisan atu Nicaragua matatules ku lala', u lilis nu kanatal a katanayu' 309 malebut miy, nuwalian nutimulan pasayza i nutimulan atu nu Panama a lala' (u lilis nu kanatal a katanayu' 639 malebut miy). pulung izaw ku 51,100 km2, namakasalala'ay 50,660 km2, i lilis nu nanum 440 km2, palaleca tu nu Amilika a Si-wyi-ci-niy-ya-cuw kaadidi', amahiza tu nu Ireland . Costa riga u liwliw nu lala', dadipasan u masaenalay, tepanay nukanatal masalikaku ku buyu' masulaed, uynian a kanatal sakamusa uyni simungay situngusay tu sikikalisiwan a kenis 200 km katanayu' nu bayu, nubayuwan 12 km katanayu' nu bayu,u bali u akutiay atu tatungusay a akuti' izaw henay ku zuma' u baluhay a akuti'ay. Costa riga u saicelangay nu hulic a nilekecaan tu mahiniay u sunida kapulungan a kanatal , mikawaway tuni cenbu u sidimada u cung-tung ku situngusay, u icelang nu cung-tung kapulung nu kanatal, uynian a kanatal tusa ku midabay atu pasu cacay tademaw midapay tu cung-tung 15 ku tademaw masakaputay nu lalabu nu mikawaway, Cung-tung atu 57 a tademaw nu lipuing a giing u nisikiwan, i sepat a mihcaan mala giing. Costa riga u inutebanan Amilika a kakitizaan a sakikalisiw u macakatay a kanatal, kapah kuni kauzip atu kayadah ku sakikalisiwan, uyni u kikasumat nu sakikalisiwan hawsa, Costa riga i ayaw namiida tu nikalukan uyni dada' ku palahatan tu sakikalisiwan uyni u aidangan u dikiay atu sapangaay tu imelangay pulung han patahakal atu pasubana' tu tineng nikawaw tu angangan tu yadahay tu canacananay a sakikalisiwan. Costa riga nu papiidangay a kawaw paymihcaan kunilaculan a kalisiw 19.2 a i'ek nu Amei-lika a kalisiw, nu Cung-may a kakitizaan mizizaway a kanatal miidangay a lapng u sakatuuday nu kanatal, 2013 a mihcaan 242 a mang ku nu tuway kanatal a labang, kayadah ku lalayan nu mauzipay mulangaway, palalecat tu kapahay u angangan nupatizang atu kapahay a nipikuwan nu kanatal , uynian a kanatal papiidangay a kawaw u lalayan izaw tu ku nidademec , u kapahay a idangan izaw ku Yi-la-su silamalay a buyu, A-lel-na'silamalay a buyu Po-lay-se silamalay a buyu', Ao-si-siw-na-el a kanayal, nu kanatalay nu buyu'ay mipaydangay kakitizaan miading tu aadupan, Meng-te-wo-de-yum-wu' a buyu'an pitiputan tu kakitizaan, Spain nu micumuday a tademaw nisubelidan a lalangawan . Costa riga a tademawan malalamelay izang a wawa atu tatenga'ay nu Europe a tademaw pakala' tu siwa a bataan izaw ku sepat a pasantu 94%, angangan mabulaway nu Spain a tademaw, uzuma yadah henay kunu Germany a tademaw, Poland a tademaw, Italy a tademaw atu Jewish a tademaw , i Costa riga uyza dada' cayay kakatuud ku Indians (In-ti-an a tademaw 印第安人) makay satipan midebungay ku mauzip, ayza u muenengay nu binacadan a tademaw 29,000 a tademaw dada'caay kaedeng tu pilung nu tademaw tu cacay a pasentu. inahini Italy a tademaw a tademaw macunus tu katuud nu tademaw, angangan u sakangelih uyni an u mabulaawy a kaizaw kakanan nu tademaw, a pakala tu a izaw ku sakalukan numalukay a tademaw. Costa riga atu Mey-kuo i kasumamadan malalayattuay tu Amilika atu sakakaput a kanatal, Costa riga i 2007 a mihcaan atu Cung-haw-min-kuo makaketun malacabay, pananiyul atu China malacabay, satu paales hantu ku Cung-ha-min-kuo mingkiw asa caay a pangangan micumud tu kanatal , namahini hawsa masusul , hamin nu mingkiw nu Cung-haw-min-kuo a minkiw a caay pangangan amicumut tu Costa riga a kanatal atu ci pazena' mihibamh sayadahay a demiad 90. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 90天.)

o Costa Riga sa i labo no Congnanmeico, itiza i 10 00 N, 84 00 W. o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa izaw ko 51,100 km2.o ahebal no lala'ay sa izaw ko 51,060 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa izaw ko 40 km2. hamin no tademawan sa 4,872,543. kakalokan omah sa 37.10%, kilakilangan omah sa 51.50%, zomaay henay omah sa 11.40% tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o San Jose . sapadateng no kanatal demiad sapadateng no kanatal demiad sa 15 bolad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Lois Goillermo Solís , micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 5 bolad 8 demiad. o hata no Costa riga o kolit no hata no Costa riga sa, sitolo a kolit, o somilaway o salenagcay ato somanahay. Costa Riga kapolongan a kanatal (no kamo no Si-Ban-Ya: República de Costa Rica), ngangan to Costa riga , o imi malobicay a dadipasan ,no inotebanan Amiliak a kanatal, nowamisan belaw o Nicaragoa notimolan o Panama matatoles ko lala', kahenolan a tose o Sen-he-si , Costa riga o ayzaay i kitakit o saayaway mipaelesan a hitay no kanatal, imahini no Costa riga no inotebanan Amiliak a kakitizaan cin-ci o sakapahay nipalahadan a kanatal, kapah makakat koni kaozip na mahini sibaloco' mipopot to ihekalay no maozipay molangway i kanatal, yadah ko no lalayan to pidipotan, masilot to i bo-po-se masilot to 2020 a mihcaan miales to namalahitay mananeng to singangan to i kanatal. (o kamo no Holam sa: Costa riga :República de Costa Rica), .) laylay iayaw a zitay no Ke-long-po , izaw to moengen ko In-di-an a tdemaw i tini i Costa riga o Cong-mey-cow-oan-min makakatay ko nika ozip ato An-ti-se-wen-min i kalikelohan. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) kasomamadan to 16 a mihcaan, i tiniay a Ya-me a tademaw a tademaw ato A-ce-tay-ce a tademaw, mademec no Spain a tademaw, sato Costa riga mala o Spain a lala' balohay a Spain satimolan a kenis,i sebo i tiza i Ka-ta-ke (Cartago). (o kamo no Holam sa: 16世紀, (Cartago).) Costa riga makalaliw to nipitebong ilawlaw no Cong-may-cow paykanatal masomad to kawaw no hitay, caay kalecat to no belaw no kanatal, Costa riga o tanektekay masongaay ato binawlan komikowanay to mahiniay, kasomamdan to 19 a mihcaan to zikozan, kinatosa pacena to oni o kalalepo a kawaw masawaco to konipalahat no binawlan, 1948 a mihcaan kangangayaw no kanatal Costa riga a Cong-tong ci He-say-bey-ke-lay-si-bey-lay-rl mosakamo paliwasak to hitay, ato i 1949 a mihcaan onian paholic han, namahini haosa Costa riga mikapot to nayay a hitay mikapot tono binawlanay a nizatengan.Costa riga anomahinihini mahiza to palekal to kanatalay , nika malecat to katalakaw koni kaozip, izaw amin ko tantowa' no lala', saaca papiidangay a kawaw macakat koni palahat. .) helal no lala' Costa riga i tini inotebanan Amilika tanayo'ay likeco'ay a kakitizaan, amis balatto cacay bataan a to(北緯10度), tipan balatto walo bataan izaw ko sepat a to(西經84度), notimolan micapi to Ciy-le-pi' a bayo , satipan micapi nowamisan a waliyo , izaw ko 1,290 malebot miy ko dadipasan (nowalian a tokos Ciy-le-pi-hay 212 malebot no miy, satipan a tokos o waliyo 1016 malaebot a depah.Costa riga nowamisan ato Nicaragoa matatoles ko lala', o lilis no kanatal a katanayo' 309 malebot miy, nowalian notimolan pasayza i notimolan ato no Panama a lala' (o lilis no kanatal a katanayo' 639 malebot miy). polong izaw ko 51,100 km2, namakasalala'ay 50,660 km2, i lilis no nanom 440 km2, palaleca to no Amilika a Si-wyi-ci-niy-ya-cow kaadidi', amahiza to no Ireland . Costa riga o liwliw no lala', dadipasan o masaenalay, tepanay nokanatal masalikako ko boyo' masolaed, oynian a kanatal sakamosa oyni simongay sitongosay to sikikalisiwan a kenis 200 km katanayo' no bayo, nobayowan 12 km katanayo' no bayo,o bali o akotiay ato tatongosay a akoti' izaw henay ko zoma' o balohay a akoti'ay. Costa riga o saicelangay no holic a nilekecaan to mahiniay o sonida kapolongan a kanatal , mikawaway toni cenbo o sidimada o cong-tong ko sitongosay, o icelang no cong-tong kapolong no kanatal, oynian a kanatal tosa ko midabay ato paso cacay tademaw midapay to cong-tong 15 ko tademaw masakapotay no lalabo no mikawaway, Cong-tong ato 57 a tademaw no lipoing a giing o nisikiwan, i sepat a mihcaan mala giing. Costa riga o inotebanan Amilika a kakitizaan a sakikalisiw o macakatay a kanatal, kapah koni kaozip ato kayadah ko sakikalisiwan, oyni o kikasomat no sakikalisiwan hawsa, Costa riga i ayaw namiida to nikalokan oyni dada' ko palahatan to sakikalisiwan oyni o aidangan o dikiay ato sapangaay to imelangay polong han patahakal ato pasobana' to tineng nikawaw to angangan to yadahay to canacananay a sakikalisiwan. Costa riga no papiidangay a kawaw paymihcaan konilacolan a kalisiw 19.2 a i'ek no Amei-lika a kalisiw, no Cong-may a kakitizaan mizizaway a kanatal miidangay a lapng o sakatooday no kanatal, 2013 a mihcaan 242 a mang ko no toway kanatal a labang, kayadah ko lalayan no maozipay molangaway, palalecat to kapahay o angangan nopatizang ato kapahay a nipikowan no kanatal , oynian a kanatal papiidangay a kawaw o lalayan izaw to ko nidademec , o kapahay a idangan izaw ko Yi-la-so silamalay a boyo, A-lel-na'silamalay a boyo Po-lay-se silamalay a boyo', Ao-si-siw-na-el a kanayal, no kanatalay no boyo'ay mipaydangay kakitizaan miading to aadopan, Meng-te-wo-de-yom-wo' a boyo'an pitipotan to kakitizaan, Spain no micomoday a tademaw nisobelidan a lalangawan . Costa riga a tademawan malalamelay izang a wawa ato tatenga'ay no Eorope a tademaw pakala' to siwa a bataan izaw ko sepat a pasanto 94%, angangan mabolaway no Spain a tademaw, ozoma yadah henay kono Germany a tademaw, Poland a tademaw, Italy a tademaw ato Jewish a tademaw , i Costa riga oyza dada' cayay kakatood ko Indians (In-ti-an a tademaw 印第安人) makay satipan midebongay ko maozip, ayza o moenengay no binacadan a tademaw 29,000 a tademaw dada'caay kaedeng to pilong no tademaw to cacay a pasento. inahini Italy a tademaw a tademaw maconos to katood no tademaw, angangan o sakangelih oyni an o mabolaawy a kaizaw kakanan no tademaw, a pakala to a izaw ko sakalokan nomalokay a tademaw. Costa riga ato Mey-koo i kasomamadan malalayattoay to Amilika ato sakakapot a kanatal, Costa riga i 2007 a mihcaan ato Cong-haw-min-koo makaketon malacabay, pananiyol ato China malacabay, sato paales hanto ko Cong-ha-min-koo mingkiw asa caay a pangangan micomod to kanatal , namahini hawsa masosol , hamin no mingkiw no Cong-haw-min-koo a minkiw a caay pangangan amicomot to Costa riga a kanatal ato ci pazena' mihibamh sayadahay a demiad 90. (o kamo no Holam sa: 90天.)
